titles.title: Election Audit Transparency Act

To amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to prohibit States from using proprietary voting system hardware or software in the administration of an election for Federal office which prevents the system from meeting the voluntary voting system guidelines for interoperability and auditability issued by the Election Assistance Commission under such Act.
Election Audit Transparency Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Election Audit Transparency Act
This bill prohibits the use of voting systems in federal elections that have proprietary hardware or software that does not meet the Election Assistance Commission's voluntary voting system guidelines for interoperability and auditability.
